name: So Many Me - PC/Mac/Linux/Wii U
blurb: Inventive, addictive puzzle-platforming gameplay with fun new twists inspired by Lost Vikings, Braid, and Portal!

rewards.reward: No Reward

SUPPORTER\r\n==============================\r\nThank you SO MUCH for your support! In return, you\u2019ll be getting a whole lot of really cool So Many Me backer-only wallpapers and your name will also be listed in the Backer Credits!

EARLY BIRD
==============================
Get all Supporter rewards and a DRM-free digital copy of So Many Me on your platform of choice! We’ll be hitting PC / Mac / Linux no matter what, and depending on which stretch goals we hit, that can also include PS4 / PS Vita / WiiU versions! Estimated retail value is $15, so get in early and save some money!
============================== 
You’ll also get printable box art and a Kickstarter-exclusive ME costume.

DIGITAL COPY
==============================
Missed the early bird specials? That’s okay, we’re still throwing in a few bonuses as thanks for your support!
==============================
You’ll get all Supporter rewards and a key to download So Many Me on your platform of choice! That’s PC / Mac / Linux no matter what, and depending on which stretch goals we hit, could also include PS4 / PS Vita / WiiU!
==============================
As in the Early Bird tier, you’ll also receive printable box art and a Kickstarter-exclusive ME costume!

EARLY ACCESS
==============================
Aha! So, you want to get in SUPER early? Well, we’ve got just the pledge tier for you! Get everything in Digital Copy tier and also receive PRIVATE EARLY ACCESS builds for PC / Mac!
==============================
The first Early Access Build will contain CHAPTER 1 and CHAPTER 2 in FULL, and we’ll be updating it every month with either a NEW CHAPTER or a NEW FEATURE!
==============================
This tier lets you participate directly in the game’s development process, receiving our most-polished version of the latest builds and helping us nail down fun gameplay and kill bugs before release!

DOUBLE COPIES
==============================
Double the Filo! Double the fun! Get all Supporter rewards and 2 keys to download So Many Me on your platform of choice based on the stretch goals we hit! That’s PC / Mac / Linux no matter what, and PS4 / PS Vita / WiiU depending on the goals.
==============================
Of course, you’ll also get printable box art and a Kickstarter-exclusive ME costume for BOTH copies!

EARLY ACCESS + SOUNDTRACK
==============================
Awesome soundtrack comes included here, along with early access! 
==============================
Get everything in the Digital Copy tier, PRIVATE EARLY ACCESS builds for either PC or Mac, AND a key to download the game’s soundtrack!

EARLY ACCESS + DIGITAL PUZZLE GUIDEBOOK
==============================
Worried that a puzzle will leave you stuck in a rut and/or flummoxed? Ever wish  the developers came up with a fun guidebook for their own game that didn’t cost a ton? Well, this tier has you covered!
==============================
Get everything in the Digital Copy tier, PRIVATE EARLY ACCESS builds for PC or Mac AND receive the OFFICIAL digital puzzle guidebook!

DIGITAL COMPLETE PACK
==============================
For the potential pledger who wants it all! This tier is jam-packed with awesome!
==============================
Get everything in the Digital Copy tier, PRIVATE EARLY ACCESS builds for PC or Mac, a key to download the game’s soundtrack, a digital puzzle guidebook PLUS a DIGITAL HI-RES POSTER FILE!

DIGITAL COMPLETE PACK + SIGNED POSTER\r\n==============================\r\nSo you want a physical tier reward, eh? This tier has you covered! You\u2019ll get everything in the Digital Complete Pack AND an A2-size Poster signed by the entire x10 team!

DIGITAL COMPLETE PACK + T-SHIRT\r\n==============================\r\nEmblazon your torso with our awesome So Many Me shirt to show your support! You\u2019ll receive everything in the Digital Complete Pack AND a super-limited-edition So Many Me T-Shirt!

DIGITAL COMPLETE PACK + PAPERBACK PUZZLE GUIDEBOOK
==============================
A physical reward tier for the inquisitive bookworm or puzzle-solving completionist!
==============================
You’ll get everything in the Digital Complete Pack AND a physical PAPERBACK puzzle guidebook that outlines the many secrets and hidden treasures of So Many Me!

COLLECTOR’S PACK
==============================
The benchmark tier for pledgers who want all those awesome physical goods listed above!
==============================
You’ll get everything in the Digital Complete Pack, the limited-edition T-Shirt, an A2-size Poster, AND the paperback puzzle guidebook!

TINY ME COMPANION
==============================
Bring Filo home! Put him on your shelf or desk and he’ll remain obediently in that spot!
==============================
By pledging to this tier, you’ll get everything in the Collector’s Pack PLUS a limited-run 4 inch-tall Filo figurine.

LIFE-SIZE ME COMPANION
==============================
Bring Filo home -- only bigger! This plush toy stands 15 inches tall and is perfect for squeezing. Go on, you know you want to.
==============================
You’ll also get everything in the Collector’s Pack, AND the 4-inch tall Filo collectible figurine.

ULTIMATE PACK
==============================
For the So Many Me fan that wants it all, and has a respectable amount of shelf space! 
==============================
You’ll get the 4-inch tall Filo figurine, the 15-inch life-size Filo plush toy, everything in the Collector’s Pack above, AND a digital copy of So Many Me for EVERY SINGLE PLATFORM WE RELEASE ON! 
==============================
We’ll go one better and say any future DLC we may come out with down the line will ALSO be included here!

FASHION LEADER
==============================
Get everything in the Ultimate Pack and help us design a ME costume from the ground up! You come up with the style, we’ll work with you to make it awesome, and then you can name it!
==============================
You’ll also receive 3 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice, so you can share your awesome fashion sense with your friends and family!
==============================
Since you’ll be contributing content directly to the game, your name will also be listed in the credits as a Co-Designer.

LEVEL ENGINEER
==============================
Get everything in the Ultimate Pack and work with our crack level designers to help us create an extra level. We’ll help you fine-tune the specifics and make it fun, then we’ll let you name it!
==============================
You’ll also receive 4 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice, so you can share your level design expertise with friends and family!
==============================
Since you’ll be contributing content directly to the game, your name will also be listed in the credits as a Co-Designer.

CO-DESIGNER PACK
==============================
You’ll practically be a member of the EXTEND team! Get everything in the Ultimate Pack and help us design both an original ME costume AND an extra level, then name them both!
==============================
In addition to the above, you will also receive 5 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice and have your name listed in the game credits as a Co-Designer!

ANCIENT SMITH
==============================
Get everything in the Co-Designer pack, then design your own NPC with your own voice and name! Your digital So Many Me avatar will serve as the blacksmith in the mysterious Horizon Ruin.
==============================
You’ll receive 10 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice so you can share your performance with friends and family, and your name will be listed in the game credits both as a Co-Designer and as a Major Contributor.

CROSSROAD DEALER
==============================
Get everything in the Co-Designer pack, then design your own NPC with your own voice and name! Your digital self will portray the devil shop owner in Horizon Ruin.
==============================
You’ll receive 10 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice so you can share your performance with friends and family, and your name will be listed in the game credits both as a Co-Designer and as a Major Contributor.

THE CREATOR
==============================
Get EVERYTHING in the Co-Designer pack AND help us create a statue of your digital So Many Me self within Horizon Ruin! The people of Xio will speak of you in reverent tones as a grand hero of a long-lost civilization. The statue is interactive and contains a brief description that you will help us create!
==============================
In addition to becoming an ancient hero of the realm, you’ll also receive 20 extra copies of the game on your platform of choice, so you can share your digital exploits and heroic status with friends and family.
==============================
Your name will be listed in the credits both as a Co-Designer and as a Supreme Contributor.
